abstract.t: The Intelligent Use Task Force (IUTF) has responsibility for organizing Dedicated Interest Groups (DIG) to research, document and validate solutions in the area of Intelligent Use Interfaces (IUI) between the various components of the whole digital ecosystem (WDE), the resulting intelligent global network (IGNet), the diversity of on-line facilitation services that their IUI and IGNet may bring to people and machines. This document describes the guidelines and procedures for the formation, operations, experimentations and publications of IUTF Dedicated Interest Groups and their internal and external relations with other SDOs (Standardization and Documentation Organizations). Its publication as an IETF Draft is part of the IUCG liaison.
